name: KILLALL
description:
Warning: the boss makes a loud noise when it dies. Instructions
  • Move left and right with the arrow keys or A/D
  • Jump with space
  • Attack with left click
  • The red circles show your attack range
  • Attacking does 2 damage when in mid air, 1 damage when not
  • You have a larger attack range when moving
  • You are slower when hurt
  • Your life bar is on the side
Versatile Verbs
  • Jumping and Attacking are versatile verbs: they do different things in different circumstances
    • Jumping is more powerful when you have a run up
    • Attacking has more range when moving or in mid air
    • Attacking in mid air does more damage
    • Attacking when in mid air or moving makes you fly towards the enemy you're attacking
